title: List of German football transfers summer 2018
text:
This is a list of <a href="Germany">German</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="transfer%20%28association%20football%29">transfers</a> in the summer transfer window 2018 by club. Only transfers of the <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> and <a href="2.%20Bundesliga">2. Bundesliga</a> are included.
